item.title: Continuous Integration Concepts using Travis CI, Circle CI, and Jenkins
item.description: Continuous Integration Core Concepts Getting Started Introduction to Continuous Integration Reducing Risks Building Software with Code Changes CI for Database Integration Continuous Testing Continuous Inspection Continuous Deployment Continuous Feedback Jenkins Travis CI Circle CI Continuous Integration Core Concepts Most of the notes in this section were gleaned from the Continuous Integration Book This is a fantastic resource and full of insightful wisdom from Steve Matyas and Paul M.
